mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId = #{relId}, `body` = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, M.nickname AS extra__writerName FROM reply AS R LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON R.memberId = M.id WHERE R.relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode} AND R.relId = #{relId} ORDER BY R.id DESC
SELECT R.*, M.nickname AS extra__writerName FROM reply AS R LEFT JOIN `member` as M ON R.memberId = M.id WHERE 1 AND R.id = #{id}
SELECT R.* FROM reply AS R WHERE R.id = #{id}
